entities.name: triwizard tournament
entities.description: The Triwizard Tournament is mentioned as the main event of the story.

entities.name: hogwarts champion
entities.description: The Hogwarts Champion is a position that will be selected from among the students.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who is talking to Mad-Eye Moody and telling the students it's bedtime.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Mad-Eye Moody is mentioned as someone Dumbledore is talking to.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as one of the students who is objecting to not being able to participate in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley is mentioned as another student who is objecting to not being able to participate in the Triwizard Tournament.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the students who is excited about the prize money.

relationships.description: Dumbledore is talking to Mad-Eye Moody.
George Weasley objects to Dumbledore's decision not to let the students participate in the Triwizard Tournament.
Fred Weasley also objects to Dumbledore's decision not to let the students participate in the Triwizard Tournament.
Ron is excited about participating in the Triwizard Tournament.
